attributes.action: Stop Bumping up fuel prices in Britain. Lower prices to reflect Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Prices of Fuel in Britain seem to be rising by the week and prices in excess of £1 a litre is ridiculous.  Protest is inevitable if these prices continue to rise. Car usage for the average person/family is becoming unmanagable not to mention the impact on profits for the small business owner.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
